#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
bool check(long long int m)
{
    while(m>0)
    {
        int r=m%10;
        if(r==3||r==5||r==6)
            return 1;
        m=m/10;
    }
    return 0;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int n,i,count,k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        count=0;
        for(i=2;i<=sqrt(n*1.0);i++)
        {
            if(n%i==0)
            {
                k=n/i;
                if(check(i)==1)
                count++;
            if(k!=i&&check(k))
            count++;
            }
        }
        if(check(n))
            count++;
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
